div.p: The processing mode that applies to this list
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/list-mode

tr.td: This list is the master list, maintained in an ongoing fashion with regular updates as the real world list it is tracking changes.
This list was prepared as a snapshot. It should not be assumed to be current.
The list is prepared as a statement of changes that have been made or recommended.
